184578.「余っている お祭りコインは\n カジノコインに 交換できるのである。\n<br:
You can exchange your leftover Festival Tokens for Casino Tokens if you wish.
However, all of your Festival Tokens will be exchanged at once, so make sure to use the Limited Exchange Shop first if you need to.
Another thing to note is that you will get 1 Casino Token for each 10 Festival Tokens you exchange.
So then, you'd like to exchange your <%dL_Coin> Festival Tokens for Casino Tokens?

184579.「お祭りコインには 二度と戻せないが\n 本当に よいのであるな？\n<yesn:
You can't get back your Festival Tokens once
exchanged. You're sure?
<yesno2><close>

184580.「おや？ 交換できる お祭りコインを\n 持っていないのである。:
Hmm? You don't have any Festival Tokens to
exchange.

184581.すべての お祭りコインを\nカジノコイン <%dc_CoinSpNum>枚に\n:
Exchanged all your Festival Tokens for
<%dc_CoinSpNum> Casino Tokens.
<se_nots System 7>

184582.<select_se_off>\nポーカーランキング\nスロットランキング\nル:
<select_se_off>
Poker Ranking
Slots Ranking
Roulette Ranking
Past Ranking
View Rewards
<select_end><break>

184583.「ランキングを 見たいのかね？\n<break>: You'd like to see the rankings?<break>

184584.「他に 見たいものは あるかね？\n<break>: Is there anything else you'd like to see?<break>

184585.「ランキングを 見たいのかね？\n<break>: You'd like to see the rankings?<break>

184586.<select_se_off>\nコインについて\nレイド討伐報酬について\nラ:
<select_se_off>
About Tokens
About Raid Rewards
About Rankings
About Raid Rules
About Big Subjugation
<select_end><break>

184587.「ワガハイから 諸君らへの挑戦状として\n カジノレイドの 討伐数を 集計した\:
As a challenge to all of you, Wagahai is holding a grand defeat event to tally up the number of casino raids that have been
defeated. For more information, please visit the Adventurer's Square. We've prepared rewards, and I want you all to show Waggahai
what you're made of! A word of advice... Raids are only as good as the people who participate. If you see one, be sure to join
in!

184588.「イベント期間中の レイドは \n 通常とは ルールが違う点が ふたつある。\n:
There are two differences between the rules of raiding during the event... The first is that the raid must end... Monsters are never
defeated, and when the time limit expires, they're always successfully defeated. In other words, you can earn coins for the
entire duration of the raid. But be warned, Bingo has a special rule that if you can't defeat a monster during a raid, you fail...
Secondly, there's bonus time... When a monster's HP is reduced to zero, bonus time is triggered. During the bonus time, you'll
earn more coins! This is your big chance! However, the bonus time ends after a certain amount of time, and the monster's HP will...
This time, there's no extra time to raid during bonus time, but you'll earn more coins! The key to a high ranking is to be
able to generate bonus time...

184589.「イベント期間中は 特殊なレイドを\n 全部で４種類 用意したのである。\n<b:
During the event, we've prepared four special raids... We're offering a reward for each one, so if you kill a new raid, come back to
Wagahai...

184590.「諸君らには １回のレイド中に 稼いだコインで\n ランキングを 競ってもらうの:
You'll be competing in a ranking system based on the amount of coins you earn during a single raid. The rankings are divided into
four categories: Poker, Slots, Roulette, and Bingo. The top 100 players will be rewarded with the most money, so if you're good at
what you do...

184591.「何を 知りたいかね？\n<break>: What do you want to know?<break>

184592.「他に 知りたいことは あるかね？\n<break>: Is there anything else you'd like to know?<break>

184593.「イベント期間中は コイン販売所で\n お祭りコインを購入し 遊んでもらうのであ:
During the event, you'll be able to purchase coins at the coin booth to play... However, in Backgammon, regular Casino Tokens are
used... If you use the coins you've earned, you can trade them for prizes at the Limited Exchange... The limited edition shop is
located next to the Wagahai... Any leftover coins can be exchanged for regular Casino Tokens after the event... You can't carry them
over to the next event, so you'll have to exchange them...

184595.「<%nL_TOUBATU_COUNT>種 討伐を 達成しているのである。\n:
You've defeated <%dL_TOUBATU_COUNT> different types of raids.
In that case, I shall reward you.
<bw_break>

184596.「引き続き レイド討伐を がんばるのである。\n<bw_break>:
Keep at it with defeating those raids, won't
you?
<bw_break>

184597.「すべてのレイドを 討伐したようであるな。\n 少しは ワガハイの ゴージャスな:
It seems you've defeated all of the different
types of raids. You've gotten a little closer
to having a glow as glorious as mine!
<bw_break>

184598.<pc>は <%nL_TOUBATU_COUNT>種 討伐の報酬として\n<%s:
<pc> received <%dc_itemnum> <%sc_item> as a
reward for defeating <%dL_TOUBATU_COUNT> type(s) of raids!
<se_nots System 7>

184599.「レイドは ４種類 用意しておる。\n 討伐した種類ごとに 報酬を授けるので\n:
There are four different types of raids. For
each one you defeat, I'll give you a reward.
Be sure to come see me when you do.
<break>

184600.「ワガハイに 声をかけるとは\n キミも 参加希望者であるな？\n<yesno>:
You've come to me because you wish to
join, yes?
<yesno><close>

184601.「そうであるか。\n 参加する気になったら\n また ワガハイの元に 来るのであ:
I see. Well, whenever you have an interest in
joining, come back and see me.

184602.「ふむ よい返事であるな！\n では早速 『カジノレイド祭り』への \n 参加登:
Mmm, very good answer! I'll get started with registering you for the Casino Raid Festival!
While I'm doing that, I'll briefly explain how it works. If you need more information, you can always ask me later.
The Casino's now in my hands, so things are a little special. This special Casino will use Festival Tokens instead.
Now, when you play Poker, Slots, Roulette, or Bingo, a special kind of raid will occur.
These raids are the centerpiece of this event. The Tokens you earn are even recorded, and the 100 best players will be ranked!
However, I've added some my gorgeously original rules to these raids, so they will play out a bit differently than usual.
So, I have one piece of advice... The more people that participate in a raid together, the more Tokens you'll earn!
To start, you should head to the Casino Exchange counter and purchase some Festival Tokens.
The Tokens you earn can be exchanged with my secretary for some fabulous prizes.
And that's all for now! Your registration is complete. I hope you'll have a smashing time with this special event! Good luck!

184603.「見たまえ この ゴージャスな空間を。\n そこにいる ゴールデンなワガハイを。:
Look at this gorgeous... There you are, golden Wagga... This is the ultimate in beauty, don't you think? I... I don't have to
tell you... I don't have to tell you... that it's not easy being the most popular girl in the world... with people like you chasing
after you. By the way, have you ever heard of raiding? It's a very interesting game... I think Waggahai would like to spread the word
about raiding. I'll see you in a little while.

184604.「おや？ おぬしは ワガハイプロデュースの\n ゴージャスな カジノイベントに\:
Hmm? You've never been to one of these gorgeous casino events produced by Waga Hai, have you? I'm preparing for the next event...
I'll be waiting for the next opportunity to hit the jackpot.

184606.<select_se_off>\nランキングをみる\nレイド討伐報酬\nコインチ:
<select_se_off>
See Rankings
Raid Prizes
Token Change
Explanation
<select_end><break>

184607.「今は 次のイベントの 準備中である。\n<break>:
We're preparing for the next event at the
moment.
<break>

184608.「今は ランキングの 集計中である。\n 結果の発表まで もうしばらく\n 待っ:
We're still counting the rankings. Please wait
a bit longer for the results, won't you?
<break>

184609.「カジノレイド祭りが 開催中である。\n 何か 用でもあるかね？\n<break:
The Casino Raid Festival is currently
underway! What can I help you with?
<break>

187225.「おや。お祭りコインが 残っておるな。\n そのコインは もう使い道がないゆえ\:
Ah, it seems you've still got some Festival
Tokens left. Those are useless now, but you
can exchange them for Casino Tokens.

187226.「受け取れる報酬は ないのである。: There's no rewards to claim right now.

187227.「ワガハイに 声をかけるとは\n キミも 参加希望者であるな？\n<yesno>:
You've come to me because you wish to
join, yes?
<yesno><close>

187228.「そうであるか。\n 参加する気になったら\n また ワガハイの元に 来るのであ:
I see. Well, whenever you have an interest in
joining, come back and see me.

187229.「ふむ よい返事であるな！\n では早速 『カジノレイド祭り』への \n 参加登:
Mmm, very good answer! I'll get started with registering you for the Casino Raid Festival!
While I'm doing that, I'll briefly explain how it works. If you need more information, you can always ask me later.
The Casino's now in my hands, so things are a little special. This special Casino will use Festival Tokens instead.
Now, when you play Poker, Slots, Roulette, or Bingo, a special kind of raid will occur.
These raids are the centerpiece of this event. The Tokens you earn are even recorded, and the 100 best players will be ranked!
However, I've added some my gorgeously original rules to these raids, so they will play out a bit differently than usual.
So, I have one piece of advice... The more people that participate in a raid together, the more Tokens you'll earn!
To start, you should head to the Casino Exchange counter and purchase some Festival Tokens.
The Tokens you earn can be exchanged with my secretary for some fabulous prizes.
And that's all for now! Your registration is complete. I hope you'll have a smashing time with this special event! Good luck!

187230.「むむ カジノコインの空きが\n 足りないようである。\n 余った分は こちらで: Mm, it looks like you're short on Casino Tokens. Do you mind if I collect the remainder here?

187231.「では <%nc_CoinSpNum>枚 空きを作ってから\n また 来るのであ:
So, <%nc_CoinSpNum> make room,
then come back...

187232.「むむ 報酬を 受け取れないようであるな。\n ゴールドを 銀行に預けてから\n:
Mmm. I can't seem to get my reward. I have to
deposit the gold in the bank and come back...

187233.「むむ 報酬を 受け取れないようであるな。\n どうぐかばんを <%nc_ite:
Hmm, I can't give you your prize. Please have
at least <%dc_item_bag> slots open in your
item bag and come back to me.

187234.「むむ 報酬を 受け取れないようであるな。\n どうぐかばんと そうびぶくろを\:
Hmm, I can't give you your prize. Please have
at least 1 slot open in your item and
equipment bags and come back to me.

187235.「おや。以前達成した レイド討伐の報酬を\n 受け取って いなかったようであるな:
Ah, it seems you never received your reward
for the raids you previously defeated.

187237.「おや おぬしか。待っていたのである。\n 見事 <%sc_RankingTit:
Oh, it's you! I've been waiting. You've earned the <%sc_RankingTitle> title for a rank of <%dL_Ranking>.
That's some gorgeous luck for a human, if I do say so myself. In recognition of this great honor, I reward you with this prize.

187238.「おや。<%sc_RankingTitle>の報酬を\n 受け取って いなかった:
Oh. It seems you didn't receive the reward
from the <%sc_RankingTitle> title.

187239.「また 次のイベントも予定しておる。\n 次回も 活躍を期待しておるぞ。:
We've got another event coming up. We look
forward to seeing you at the next one.

187391.「次のイベントには 持ち越せないので\n 余ったコインがあれば 交換しに来るとよ:
Those won't carry over into the next event,
so make sure to exchange any extra Tokens
you have left.

187392.「そうであるか。\n そのコインは もう使い道がないゆえ\n 気が向いたら 交換:
I see. Well, those Tokens have no use to you
anymore, so please exchange them whenever
you see fit, won't you?
<end>

189058.<pc>の カジノレイド祭りの\n参加登録が 完了した！\n<me 71><en:
<pc> registered for the Casino Raid
Festival!<me 71><end>

189059.「レイド大討伐も 開催中である。\n 冒険者の広場も チェックするのであるぞ！:
I hope you have an enjoyable time. Keep at it
with those raids!

189111.「次回を 楽しみに 待っているとよいぞ。: Please look forward to the next event!

189915.「おや イベント期間が 過ぎたようである。\n まことに 残念であるが\n また:
Well, it looks like the event is already over.
It's a shame you missed it, but we will be
back again.

189916.イベントが 開始された為\n処理を 実行できませんでした。:
An event has been initiated. We cannot
process it...

189917.イベントが 終了した為\n処理を 実行できませんでした。:
The event has expired and no further action
can be taken...

189918.「今は 次の報酬の 準備中なのである。: The next prizes are currently being prepared.

191278.「すべてのレイドを 討伐したようであるな。\n もう 受け取れる報酬は ないので:
It appears that you've defeated all of the
different types of raids. Unfortunately,
I have nothing left to give you.
<break>

277140.「イベント期間中のビンゴは\n お祭りコインを使って 遊ぶのである。\n<br>:
During the event, bingo is played with festive coins... The rules have been changed to reflect a special event... First of all,
in bingo, the game always starts with a raid... During the raid, bingo is the only way to deal damage to the monsters. Now, how
to play... There are 10 randomly selected numbers on your card and you have 10 seconds to place your number on the card. This bingo
draw is all about... Once the draw begins, the cards are no longer manipulated, and various bonuses are triggered. When the
monster's HP is successfully reduced to zero, bonus time will occur and a large number of gems will appear on the bingo board. When the
ball passes over a jewel, you get a coin! The jewels of the bonus time will reappear every time a draw is made, giving you the chance to
win a lot of coins!
